text:
Hi Pedram, I hope you had a good Easter?

I've started looking around for jobs as I'm only a month away from finishing uni and I'm going to apply for my first one tomorrow. I've spent the day making a CV and updating the showreel so I'm just wondering if I could get a little bit of feedback before I send it off? I completely understand if a CV isn't really your thing haha :smiley:
